text: István Bérczi (1 July 1945 – 10 April 2021) was a Hungarian gymnast. He competed in eight events at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Bérczi died on 10 April 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 75.Meghalt Bérczi István tornász, a tévétorna egyik szereplője ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Hungary Category:Olympians for Hungary Category:Hungarian gymnasts
title: István Bérczi
